body:
I'm facing same problem even checking if tensor is empty or not:
```

 loss = K.switch(tf.size(y_true) > 0,
                    tf.nn.softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(logits=y_pred, labels=y_true, dim=1),
                    tf.constant(0.0))
```
